SUBJECT: Sunday - congrats on partnership

Hi Sunday,

I saw the news about Lotus Beta Analytics's partnership - "Project and Product Development Intern at Lotus Beta Analytics ...". Congratulations!

I'm David Ariyo, a Full Stack Developer. I recently built Dassage Communication Platform - Real-time messaging with video calls, file sharing, WebSocket architecture

Tech: React, Node.js, MongoDB, WebSocket | Scale: 100+ concurrent users

Would you be open to a brief chat if Lotus Beta Analytics ever needs freelance development support?

Best regards,
David Ariyo
Full Stack Developer
davidariyo109@gmail.com | (+234) 903-6184-863
Portfolio: davidariyo.onrender.com
